programme.title: Bintang Di Langit Belitong
programme.desc: Dendam untuk masa lalu membawa Sofyan dan dua anak perempuannya, Dinda dan Bintang, dalam pengembaraan berbahaya di pulau Belitung, ketika mereka bercuti selepas menghadiri pengebumian datuk mereka.

programme.title: Azem 2
programme.desc: Beberapa orang membawa seorang gadis yang dirasuk teruk dengan kotak kayu berkunci untuk menyembuhkannya.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep3
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Shah, Adam dan Daniel berbincang dengan encik Bad untuk mencari lembaga cermin. Ketika bermula misi mereka bertiga mencari lembaga cermin, tiba-tiba Shah ternampak kekasihnya di tepi jalan. Lantaran itu dia minta rakan berhenti di situ. Setelah Shah bertemu Nur, kekasihnya itu tidak mahu perhubungan mereka diteruskan lagi, semuanya gara-gara Shah bertugas sebagai pemburu lembaga. Shah berputus asa dan sementara ini tidak mahu memburu lembaga cermin. Adam dan Daniel meneruskan misi tersebut dan mereka berkenalan dengan Abang Hashim yang berminat sama lalu turut bersama mereka memburu. Abang Hashim juga pemilik bilik tumpangan, dia juga menceritakan bagaimana tempatnya juga seolah berhantu berpunca selepas seroang wanita Inggeris menginap di tempatnya. Ketika pemburuan Abang Hashim terasa dia diganggu lembaga cermin dan seterusnya dia juga tiada mahu menyambung misi. Sementara itu Shah mencebur diri dengan berniaga di kedai runcit. Sesekali dia masih teringat bekas kekasihnya yang kini telah berminat kepada pemuda lain. Manakala Misi Adam dan Daniel belum berhasil.

programme.title: Bopeng
programme.desc: Apabila dua kawan baik, Bo dan Peng mendapat panggilan daripada seorang gadis bernama Mira Idora Senrose dan memberitahu mereka dia telah diculik dan menyaksikan pembunuhan ngeri oleh penculiknya, mereka bekerjasama dalam misi menyelamat dengan bantuan polis.

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep12
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Ryan diupah sebagai bodyguard kepada Yasmin oleh bapanya. Yasmin dilarang dari berjumpa dengan Hakim kerana ibu Hakim mempunyai sejarah silam yang menyakitkan dengan bapa Yasmin. Dalam kes berasingan, Rahul telah diupah oleh Datin untuk mengintip kegiatan Dato Rahman. Dato dikatakan mempunyai skandal dengan perempuan lain. Nasha telah meminta Danial menjaga Harris yang selalu diganggu oleh along. Danial mendapati Harris menjadi penjamin kepada rakannya Anuar untuk meminjam wang along tetapi tidak membayar balik wang tersebut. Anuar memberitahu wang tersebut telah dirompak, mereka telah diarahkan oleh Nasha membuat laporan polis. Sementara itu, hubungan Farish dengan Nasha kembali pulih.

programme.title: Face off: Studios
programme.desc: Trung dan abangnya adalah stuntman filem profesional. Untuk mengumpul wang bagi pengarah filem menyiapkan penerbitan filem mereka, adik-beradik itu membantu bos triad untuk menyeludup barangan haram sebagai pertukaran untuk pelaburannya dalam filem itu. Walau bagaimanapun, mereka tidak lama lagi mendapati bahawa mereka telah jatuh ke dalam perangkap.

programme.title: Ritual
programme.desc: Peter, dan isterinya jenny, serta anak perempuan mereka lisa, dan kekasihnya michael berkelah di satu tempat yang terpencil. Pelbagai perkara seram terjadi sepanjang mereka disana.

programme.title: Melati Putih
programme.desc: Melati bercita-cita tinggi tetapi tidak dapat melaksanakannya kerana tergoda dengan seorang doktor muda. Akibat hubungan dengan doktor itu, nama baiknya telah tercemar. Seorang pemuda cacat di kampung itu jatuh hati padanya tetapi cinta lelaki itu dipermainkannya. Setelah Melati dikecewakan oleh doktor itu, barulah dia sedar cinta suci si pemuda itu.

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Selepas kematian isteri tercinta, Mahmud, seorang hartawan telah berkahwin dengan Zubaidah, yang merupakan janda anak satu. Mahmud mempunyai seorang anak lelaki bernama Anuar dan anak angkat perempuan bernama Mira. Baharum, anak kepada Zubaidah berkawan baik dengan Mira. Apabila mereka meningkat dewasa, hubungan mereka bertambah erat dan saling mencintai antara satu sama lain. Anuar tidak senang dengan perhubungan itu kerana khuatir harta ayahnya akan jatuh ke tangan mereka berdua.

programme.title: Tiada Esok Bagimu
programme.desc: Ghazlan seorang arkitek yang mempunyai dua orang anak, Amir dan Emi. Akibat satu peristiwa yang menyebabkan kematian Emi, Ghazlan menjadi buta kerana terlalu sedih. Selepas itu Ghazlan bersama isterinya mengambil seorang anak angkat yang dinamakan Emi. Identiti sebenar Emi dirahsiakan sehingga dia dewasa. Satu tragedi berlaku kepada Emi sehingga dia nekad untuk mencari ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Esok Untuk Siapa
programme.desc: Milah seorang peragawati yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat perusahaan batik milik Dato Iskandar. Dato Iskandar ingin menjodohkan Milah dengan anaknya, Ikhsan namun anaknya itu berkeras hati tidak mahu menurut kemahuan bapanya. Demi mengelakkan daripada menanggung malu, Milah bersetuju dinikahkan dengan Jiman, pengurus syarikat Dato Iskandar. Milah dan Jiman terlibat dalam satu kemalangan jalan raya sehingga mengakibatkan Jiman lumpuh dan mengalami kecederaan otak yang serius. Keadaan menjadi semakin teruk apabila Ikhsan memaksa Jiman untuk melepaskan Milah kerana dia ingin memperisterikan Milah.

programme.title: Melati Putih
programme.desc: Melati bercita-cita tinggi tetapi tidak dapat melaksanakannya kerana tergoda dengan seorang doktor muda. Akibat hubungan dengan doktor itu, nama baiknya telah tercemar. Seorang pemuda cacat di kampung itu jatuh hati padanya tetapi cinta lelaki itu dipermainkannya. Setelah Melati dikecewakan oleh doktor itu, barulah dia sedar cinta suci si pemuda itu.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.title: Esok Masih Ada
programme.desc: Kematian satu-satunya anak miliknya akibat leukemia mengubah hidup seorang pegawai polis. ASP Zamri kemudiannya bertemu dengan Marina dan menjalinkan hubungan sulit bersamanya. Pelbagai halangan perlu dihadapinya oleh kerana kerjanya sebagai seorang pegawai polis. Akhirnya, Marina dan Zamri pun berkahwin dan dikurniakan anak - namun anak tersebut diserahkan kepada isteri pertama Zamri, Faridah untuk dijaga.

programme.title: Da Di Du
programme.desc: Badu, Badi dan Bada, bertemu dan menjadi sahabat ketika mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan seorang guru persilatan bernama Pak Tua kerana ingin memperbetulkan kisah silam yang tidak menyebelahi nasib mereka. Sepanjang itu terdapat pelbagai peristiwa yang berlaku dari mula mereka belajar sehingga tamat dan pulang ke kampung masing-masing untuk memperbetulkan masa lalu mereka.

programme.title: Azizah The Legend
programme.desc: Hubungan percintaan yang tidak direstui oleh orang tua antara Azizah dan Ramli. Diapi-apikan pula hubungan mereka oleh Aziz. Melihatnya sebagai satu cabaran, Ramli pergi ke Singapura untuk mencari rezeki demi menghalalkan Azizah dan mendapatkan restu bapanya - kerja kerasnya berhasil namun lamarannya masih ditolak.

programme.title: Anak Sulung Tujuh Keturunan
programme.desc: Megat Paji Alam memiliki sebilah keris ajaib yang diturunkan sejak turun temurun lagi. Anaknya, Iskandar Alam ditangkap musuh tetapi berjaya diselamatkan oleh pasangan yang menamakannya Hamzah. Dipecat oleh Megat Paji Alam, Megat Daka pergi mencari Hamzah. Tidak diketahui oleh Hamzah bahawa Megat Panji Alam ialah bapa kandungnya.

programme.title: Qaisy & Laila
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai cinta dan pengorbanan gadis Malaysia, Laila yang menyertai Malaysian Relief Team dan jatuh cinta dengan pemuda Afghanistan, Qaisy yang sebelumnya terpaksa menamatkan pengajiannya di Malaysia untuk menjaga adik perempuannya apabila ahli keluarganya yang lain terbunuh semasa Amerika Syarikat melancarkan peperangan ke atas Afghanistan

programme.title: Kelisa
programme.desc: Bapa Sarah dibunuh oleh Zaid membuatkannya harus mengambil alih perniagaaan keluarganya. Tidak mengetahui tentang perkara itu, Sarah mendapat satu tender daripada Zaid namun tidak dipersetujui ibunya kerana tahu akan kelicikannya. Malang menimpanya apabila ibu Sarah meninggal dunia. Sarah ingin membuka semula kes bapanya dan membawa Zaid ke muka pengadilan dengan mendapatkan bantuan seorang bekas banduan.

programme.title: Pendekar Helang
programme.desc: Diutuskan oleh Baginda Sultan untuk mengamankan sebuah desa yang sedang bergolak angkara pendekar yang jahat, Pendekar Helang sengaja mencetuskan huru-hara supaya tidak disyaki oleh Pendekar Daing yang kejam. Pendekar Daing sering mencuri harta orang kampung dan juga menculik anak dara sebagai tahanannya lalu mencetuskan kacau bilau kepada orang di desa itu. Sengaja melakukan perjanjian bersamanya, Pendekar Helang mengambil Sundang Panca Sakti yang dikatakan mampu membunuh pendekar jahat itu dari simpanan Penghulu Malim untuk diberi kepada Pendekar Daing sebagai muslihat untuk membunuhnya. Berlakulah pertarungan antara mereka yang menjadi kunci kepada keamanan di desa itu.

programme.title: Da Di Du
programme.desc: Badu, Badi dan Bada, bertemu dan menjadi sahabat ketika mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan seorang guru persilatan bernama Pak Tua kerana ingin memperbetulkan kisah silam yang tidak menyebelahi nasib mereka. Sepanjang itu terdapat pelbagai peristiwa yang berlaku dari mula mereka belajar sehingga tamat dan pulang ke kampung masing-masing untuk memperbetulkan masa lalu mereka.

programme.title: Anak Sulung Tujuh Keturunan
programme.desc: Megat Paji Alam memiliki sebilah keris ajaib yang diturunkan sejak turun temurun lagi. Anaknya, Iskandar Alam ditangkap musuh tetapi berjaya diselamatkan oleh pasangan yang menamakannya Hamzah. Dipecat oleh Megat Paji Alam, Megat Daka pergi mencari Hamzah. Tidak diketahui oleh Hamzah bahawa Megat Panji Alam ialah bapa kandungnya.

programme.desc: Hubungan percintaan yang tidak direstui oleh orang tua antara Azizah dan Ramli. Diapi-apikan pula hubungan mereka oleh Aziz. Melihatnya sebagai satu cabaran, Ramli pergi ke Singapura untuk mencari rezeki demi menghalalkan Azizah dan mendapatkan restu bapanya - kerja kerasnya berhasil namun lamarannya masih ditolak.

Pendekar Daing sering mencuri harta orang kampung dan juga menculik anak dara sebagai tahanannya lalu mencetuskan kacau bilau kepada orang di desa itu. Sengaja melakukan perjanjian bersamanya, Pendekar Helang mengambil Sundang Panca Sakti yang dikatakan mampu membunuh pendekar jahat itu dari simpanan Penghulu Malim untuk diberi kepada Pendekar Daing sebagai muslihat untuk membunuhnya. programme.title: Qaisy & Laila

programme.title: Kelisa
programme.desc: Bapa Sarah dibunuh oleh Zaid membuatkannya harus mengambil alih perniagaaan keluarganya. Tidak mengetahui tentang perkara itu, Sarah mendapat satu tender daripada Zaid namun tidak dipersetujui ibunya kerana tahu akan kelicikannya. Malang menimpanya apabila ibu Sarah meninggal dunia. Sarah ingin membuka semula kes bapanya dan membawa Zaid ke muka pengadilan dengan mendapatkan bantuan seorang bekas banduan.

programme.title: Sayang Salmah
programme.desc: Semangat cinta akan bangsa dan negara diterapkan dalam diri Hassan dan Salleh selaku anak kepada Encik Jabar dan Dasimah yang inginkan anak mereka mempunyai rasa patriotik akan negara. Hassan, aktif dalam bidang politik manakala Salleh menjadi seorang pemuda liar yang suka berhibur. Segalanya berubah apabila ayah mereka meninggal dunia.

programme.title: Operasi Cegah Jenayah
programme.desc: Dua orang anggota polis, Shah dan Din telah ditugaskan untuk mengawasi satu pertunjukan permata berlian yang bernilai jutaan ringgit. Pihak penganjur juga meminta mereka berdua menjaga para peragawati mereka yang sedang bercuti daripada pertunjukan itu. Dalam masa yang sama, Crystal yang menjadi pengurus agensi peragawati itu merancang satu rompakan barangan berharga yang berada dalam pengawasan Shah dan Din.

programme.title: Cikgu Sayang
programme.desc: Seorang guru muda bernama Idayu telah dihantar ke sebuah kampung di Pulau Dinawan untuk mengajar sekolah orang dewasa. Di sana, Idayu telah digelarkan sebagai Cikgu Sayang oleh pelajarnya. Kehadiran Idayu di pulau itu telah menimbulkan perasaan cemburu kepada isteri para pelajarnya. Dalam masa yang sama, Idayu mula tertarik dengan seorang pemuda bernama Anuar yang tinggal di pulau itu.

programme.title: Rimba Malam
programme.desc: Sofea, seorang gadis jutawan diburu oleh orang-orang Farouk untuk membunuhnya. Satu kemalangan yang disengajakan telah membuatkan Sofea terdampar di tengah-tengah hutan belantara di Kalimantan. Farouk dan orang-orangnya masih memburu Sofea apabila mengetahui dia masih hidup dan tinggal di sebuah perkampungan orang hulu di sana. Sofea sempat menyelamatkan diri atas pertolongan Rafi, pemuda kampung itu ketika Farouk datang mencarinya.

programme.title: Serampang Tiga
programme.desc: Pak Guntor menghantar anaknya, Indra untuk pergi mendamaikan sebuah kampung dan bertemu adiknya, Naneng. Indra ditemani rakannya, Jalur dalam perjalanan itu. Setibanya mereka di kampung itu, mereka membantu Kiambang dan ayahnya yang diganggu sekumpulan orang jahat. Indra menemui adiknya namun dia telah mati dibunuh. Indra berjanji untuk menuntut bela kematian adiknya.

programme.title: Si Luncai
programme.desc: Cinta ditolak kerana pangkat dan darjat, Si Luncai, sang pengembala kambing pergi dengan harapan yang hancur. Dirinya yang lurus dipermainkan oleh Ketua Kampung - namun kejadian tersebut telah membawanya ke seorang nenek kebayan yang telah mengubah hidupnya. Si Luncai menyamar menjadi tukang tabib dan mempermainkan semula Ketua Kampung itu. Berjayakah rancangan Si Luncai untuk mendapatkan cintanya?

programme.title: Sayang Salmah
programme.desc: Semangat cinta akan bangsa dan negara diterapkan dalam diri Hassan dan Salleh selaku anak kepada Encik Jabar dan Dasimah yang inginkan anak mereka mempunyai rasa patriotik akan negara. programme.title: Ehsan Love Story
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki tampan bernama Sian yang berasal dari Utara Thailand. Sian dibesarkan oleh ibunya selepas kematian bapanya. Sian yang baru habis belajar menunggu kepulangan teman wanitanya bernama Som yang belajar di Bangkok.

programme.title: Cinta Tak Semudah Dot Com
programme.desc: Seorang ejen hartanah lelaki muda yang miskin telah menyamar sebagai tuan punya sebuah banglo kepada seorang pelanggan wanita yang cantik dan diingati kaya tetapi mempunyai musilhat. Wanita tersebut yang merupakan seorang penjual kosmetik tiruan telah menyamar sebagai seorang wanita kaya dengan tujuan untuk mencari dan berkahwin dengan lelaki kaya.

programme.title: Maria Leonora Teresa
programme.desc: Selepas insiden tragis, pakar psikiatri menawarkan anak patung bersaiz hidup Faith, Julio, dan Stella untuk membantu mengatasi kehilangan anak perempuan Maria, Leonora dan Teresa. Tetapi mainan itu tiba-tiba menjadi jahat.

programme.title: Tmo Ustaz Mu Tunggu Aku Datang
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Ustaz Mu Tunggu Aku Datang

programme.title: Bukan Orang Buta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuzik jalanan (busker) yang berbakat tetapi tidak diberi perhatian orang ramai telah menukar strateginya untuk menyamar sebagai seorang busker buta. Penyamarannya mula menarik perhatian ramai dan berjaya dilamar oleh sebuah syarikat muzik terkemuka. Walau bagaimanapun beliau perasan bahawa syarikat tersebut mempunyai agenda dan konspirasi jahat yang cuba dilakukan oleh seorang wanita yang juga pemilik syarikat muzik terkemuka tersebut. Jejaka tersebut bertekad dan mencuba menggagalkan kegiatan haram majikannya sambil terus berlakon sebagai seorang pemuzik buta.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep7
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Demi Hati Arjuna
programme.desc: Alia disahkan menghidap penyakit hati Cirrhosis. Alia teringat masa silamnya memang liar. Bagi merawat penyakitnya, dia disaran melakukan transplan. Namun. Alia yang sebatang kara sukar untuk dia mendapatkan penderma. Dia kemudian teringat akan Arjuna, anak yang dia lahirkan 12 tahun dahulu bersama Zafran. Zafran tidak mahu bertanggungjawab. Anak itu diserahkan kepada orang lain selepas dinamakan sebagai Arjuna.

programme.title: Putar Alam
programme.desc: kegiatan jenayah yang dilakukan oleh seorang pemuda bersama rakan-rakannya untuk menjadi cepat kaya. Melalui perniagaan salun rambut mereka menipu pelanggan dalam berbagai cara untuk mendapatkan wang.

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Berkisar tentang dua orang pemuda kampung berhijrah ke bandar untuk mencari kekayaan. Setelah beberapa lama berusaha mereka masih dibelegu dengan masalah kewangan. Oleh itu mereka mula terjebak dalam pelbagai kegiatan judi sebagai jalan mudah untuk cepat kaya.

programme.title: Hujan Bulan Juni
programme.desc: Pingkan (Velove Vexia), seorang pensyarah muda di Universitas Sastera Jepang Indonesia, berpeluang belajar di Jepun selama dua tahun. Sarwono (Adipati Dolken) sedih mendengar berita bahawa dia akan ditinggalkan oleh Pingkan.

programme.title: The Spiral
programme.desc: Jon Caine, pensyarah universiti yang dihormati, didapati hilang. Tiga bulan kemudian dia muncul semula dan membunuh sekumpulan orang awam dan polis di sebuah kafe. Selepas ditangkap oleh Detektif Inspektor Aleana, dia dihantar ke hospital mental untuk disoal siasat oleh pakar psikologi jenayah, Dr Melanie Surya. Melanie tidak lama kemudian mengetahui bahawa kewujudannya adalah kunci kepada perubahan mendadak Jon dalam tingkah laku dan akhirnya, dia membuka kunci rahsia Jon yang telah disimpan dalam dirinya.

programme.title: My Sweet Madu
programme.desc: Sebuah kisah komedi perkahwinan Farel bersama isteri-isterinya Intan dan Bella.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12 Ep11
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.desc: Chow terpaksa berpindah ke rumah datuknya selepas penceraian ibu bapanya. chow mendaftar kan diri di sekolah san min. pada hari pertamanya, rakan sekelasnya memberitahunya bahawa sekolah itu membentuk mata. semasa dalam perjalanan pulang dari sekolah, chow dpt rasakan ada sesuatu telah berlaku disekolah itu dan dia ingin menyiasat apa yang dirahsiakan oleh pihak sekolah selama ini.

programme.title: Mat Kari Mek Tomyam
programme.desc: Wanda seorang gadis kampung yang datang ke Kuala Lumpur untuk bekerja di sebuah Caf milik makciknya, telah bertemu dengan seorang jejaka yang gila dengan masakan Kari dan Wanda seorang yang hanya pandai memasak Tom Yam yang akhirnya menjadi satu cinta. Pelbagai dugaan dan telatah mereka berdua yang ditempuh semasa mengenali antara satu sama lain.

programme.title: Sepet
programme.desc: menceritakan bagaimana dua kekasih muda dari latar belakang yang sangat berbeza menghadapi tekanan keluarga dan sosial.

programme.title: Hening Senja
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kehidupan sebuah keluarga yang bekerja dan berada di puncak. Si isteri masih belum bersedia untuk mempunyai zuriat manakala si suami sudah tidak sabar lagi untuk menimang cahaya mata. Disebabkan itu berlaku perselisihan faham diantara mereka yang kemudiannya membuka kembali kisah cinta tiga segi semasa di universiti.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep9

programme.title: Selubung
programme.desc: seorang wanita kembali ke tanah air selepas menamatkan pembelajaran diluar negara, memilih untuk menjadi sukarelawan di sebuah pertubuhan kebajikan yang membantu anak-anak pelarian Palestin. Dia berkenalan dan jatuh cinta dengan seorang pemuda yang turut aktif dalam kegiatan sosial anjuran pertubuhan itu.

programme.title: Hujan Bulan Juni
programme.desc: Pingkan (Velove Vexia), seorang pensyarah muda di Universitas Sastera Jepang Indonesia, berpeluang belajar di Jepun selama dua tahun. Sarwono (Adipati Dolken) sedih mendengar berita bahawa dia akan ditinggalkan oleh Pingkan.

programme.title: Kamu Tercandu-Candu Sama Ketampananku
programme.desc: Ariel dengan sengaja menghukum Yani kerana sejak awal, Ariel tidak senang dengan Yani, menganggap bahawa Yani sering membuat masalah. Tetapi pada hakikatnya, Ariel sebenarnya menyukai Yani kerana mereka suka bekerja bersama-sama.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep162
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Star Ep98
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep35
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep115

programme.title: Jangan Ada PHK Diantara Kita
programme.desc: Bambang pergi ke Jakarta untuk mencari kerja, tetapi sebaliknya, dia diserang oleh geng Ajeng kerana Bambang telah membantu Andra, bos syarikat tersebut, melarikan diri.

programme.title: Suster El Ep41
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. programme.title: Panji Petualang 911 Ep10
programme.desc: Tonton program Panji Petualang 911 untuk mempelajari tentang haiwan dan memerhati keunikan alam liar sambil berseronok dalam pengembaraan bersama Panji.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep47
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: Six Ball
programme.desc: Talented billiard player Sung-hoon hurt his left hand in a game because of Mr. Young's plan. He decided to take revenge on him and get ready for a final battle...

programme.title: Howling
programme.desc: A detective and his rookie partner probe a murder in which the victim appears to have unusual bite marks.

programme.title: A Man Who Was Superman
programme.desc: Soo-jung met a man who claimed himself as a "superman" and loves to give a helping hand to people in need. She then realizes the story behind his seemingly weird behavior...

programme.title: Very Ordinary Couple
programme.desc: A couple working in the same bank broke up but continue to see each other in workplace. They couldn't help but pay attention to each other even more than they were dating...

programme.title: Nameless Gangster: Rules Of The Time
programme.desc: On the verge of being fired, a corrupt customs official finds a haul of drugs and teams up with a vicious gangster to become the most powerful crime partnership in Busan.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: How To Steal A Dog
programme.desc: As the family goes bankrupt, Jiso decided to steal dog from wealthy family and return it for the reward money. Will her plan be successful?

programme.title: My Puppy
programme.desc: A groom-to-be sets off with his friend to finding a new owner for his puppy.

programme.title: Take Off
programme.desc: Rounding up five inexperienced athletes from a small Korean town with nothing to lose, they form the first Korean ski jump team in hope of winning gold.

programme.title: 71: Into The Fire
programme.desc: 71 student-soldiers fight an impossible war against the elite 766 Commando Brigade and turn the tide of the Korean War.

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the target's large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Search Out
programme.desc: When a social media influencer finds traces of cyberbullying that led to his neighbor's suicide, he teams up with his friend to untangle the mystery behind the deadly game.

programme.title: The President'S Barber
programme.desc: A man and his family get tangled in decades of political chaos when he was appointed as the president's personal barber.

programme.title: Feng Shui
programme.desc: A fengshui expert, Park Jae-Sang, who can determine the land that bring good fortune and people around him compete to occupy the land in order to change their fate and become king.

programme.title: Fabricated City
programme.desc: When an online gamer is framed for a murder, a hacker tries to uncover the truth behind the murder case and help clear his name.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: Ji Min witnesses a hit-and-run and starts confusing reality and fantasy. She becomes a suspect of the hit-and-run along with Woo Ri, with a policeman chasing their every move named In Tae.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: A washed-up former hit producer and a young man with stage fear while aspiring to be a singer head off on a road trip filled with music and jamming sessions.

programme.title: Nameless Gangster: Rules Of The Time

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: Pawn

programme.title: The Pension

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: Be With You

programme.title: The Spies

programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep5455
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each others back.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep9
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep851852
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep681
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3382
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46684669
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep8182
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1833
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep955
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly mans spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boys dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wangs which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Shaolin vs Evil Dead Ultimate Power
programme.desc: In this kung fu vampire sequel, a Shaolin monk takes on a Taoist-priest-turns-evil-vampire to stop his killing spree.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: Love is…Pyjamas
programme.desc: Underwear designer Spring and her daughter work at Hugos enterprise. Hugo demands a new fashion line design competition between Spring and the newly employed ex model Jojo to save his company from bankruptcy and the winner will take charge of the line. Who will win the competition and will Hugos enterprise be saved?

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chefs delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Chois actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the teams downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: First Love the Litter on the Breeze
programme.desc: This movie is the directorial debut of actor Eric Kot for Wong Kar Wai. Eric features the topic of first love in his first movie: a sleepwalker guided through the night by a lonely admirer is bizarre yet romantic, while a married grocer facing the vengeful first love that he once rejected is heartbreaking.

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Rogers family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Ekin Cheng and Chrissie Chau reunite in this romantic-comedy about three heartbroken men who each purchase an iGirl, the latest smart-robot, as their new girlfriends.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 2
programme.desc: Qin Feng was tricked by Tang Ran to participate in the "World Detective Contest" in New York's Chinatown. Their task is to find the murderer of the grandson of Godfather, Uncle Qi. When famous detectives from all over the world investigate the case, two other cases occurred with a very similar modus operandi

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: In 2004, 10 months after the murder of Yan, Ming is transferred to do menial police work. Meanwhile, a new star Wing has emerged in the police force. Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring that his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: Man Of Iron
programme.desc: Chou Lian Huan (Chen Kuan Tai) is good at fist fighting in Shanghai. In order to please a hostess named Chen Ju Fang (Ching Li), he is willing to sacrifice everything and fight against the son of the gang leader in Shanghai. However, is Chous action worth it?

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Boxer From The Temple
programme.desc: A young monk, The Kid, was expelled from the temple due to his crazy ways. After leaving the temple, he fights a cruel bandit's son and befriends a prostitute. As he fights for justice, his Crazy Lo Han Fist improves with every fight.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chuns plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clan's fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents' death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: Challenge Of The Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, the same martial arts teacher of his father. Although he is defeated in the competition, Wong Fei Hungs passion in Kung Fu finally allows him to become Lus disciple.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Carry On Doctors And Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chans first major movies) for an evocative and terrific Martial arts world adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his wife Gan Lian Zhu are the famous Twin Swords in the martial arts world. One day, they stumble upon a kidnapping plot at the Red Lotus Temple and Lian Zhu is held captive. Wu successfully escapes to find the Gan family for help, not knowing that he is sending them into an ambush by the kidnappers. Can he finally save Lian Zhu?

programme.title: The Story Of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chus family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The 36Th Chamber Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: The Web Of Death
programme.desc: To rule the martial arts world, the Head of the Snake Sect seeks to possess a deadly plant called Five Poison Web, spreading rumours on its whereabouts. Brothers Xiong and Kit are sent to investigate. Xiong falls in love with Su who has a clue of where the plant is, but she accidentally hurts Kit when seeking the plant, devastating Xiong.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed The Invincible Fist is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Peng fought against many swordsmen and won, so he could not accept his first defeat and wanted to commit suicide. It is at this time that Peng meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader. They fall in love and want to get married. The Sect leader gives Peng the Full Moon Scimitar on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: Lung seeks five volumes of a renowned Kung Fu manual to gain invincibility. When he believes a martial arts school master possesses the volumes, he kills him and his daughter but leaves behind a young brother and sister. Years later, Lung loses two volumes and starts another bloody hunt but each attempt is interrupted by two mysterious warriors...

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: To Kill A Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: The Blue And The Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: Thangaraja
programme.desc: Tamil Action Movie, Starring, Nagarjuna, Ramya Krishna, Naga Chaitanya and Krithi Shetty.

programme.title: Taana
programme.desc: Tamil Action, Comedy Horror Film, Starring, Vaibhav, Nandita Sweta, Yogi Babu & Others

programme.title: Thalaivi
programme.desc: Thalaivi is a Indian historical drama, which is loosely based on the life of the late Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Jayalalithaa, Starring,'Kangana Ranaut, Arvind Swami

programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring,starring Karu Palaniappan, Nikita, Soundararaja, Maya Chandran, Namo Narayana & Others

programme.title: Idhu Ennoda Jilla
programme.desc: Tamil action drama movie starring Jr. NTR and Pooja Hegde. The story revolves around Veera Raghava, who loses his father to a fight with the opposition faction in the village before he can reach his hometown. Upset, Veera Raghava decides to put an end to the violence

programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump

programme.title: Stormy Weather

programme.title: Gold Runner

programme.title: Karakol
programme.desc: After recently losing her father, Clara discovers a passport, foreign bills and letters while going through his things. Suspecting that he is living a secret life, she embarks on a trip to Karakil, a lake in Tajikistan, to find out the truth.

programme.title: 7 Ways To Love
programme.desc: Hadi and Fifi are colleagues and deeply attracted to one another. However, both are married. As time passes, the burden of their infidelity creeps up on them. One day, Hadi discovers that his wife is pregnant. Will Hadi end the affair?

programme.title: Kids Run
programme.desc: Andi is a former boxer who now struggles as a day labourer. When he loses his job suddenly, he finds himself threatened with the loss of custody of his beloved three children. An amateur boxing competition with a huge prize money becomes his only hope.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep7
programme.desc: In this episode, tortilla chips are produced by the thousand, bite-size coffee cakes are created, and vegan mint double chocolate cookies are made. Plus, a look at microwaveable popcorn.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep8
programme.desc: This episode looks at the production of Triple "C" cheesecake, animal crackers, crispy sweet potato fries, and the tofu that gets a gourmet overhaul.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep6
programme.desc: North America - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores North America - a land of change where pioneering animals make the most of surprising opportunities.

programme.title: Mediterranean with Simon Reeve S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Simon Reeve embarks on the third leg of his four-part journey around the Mediterranean, travelling through Libya, Tunisia and across the sea to Sicily.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep4
programme.desc: Tuscany - In Tuscany, Ben meets British couple George and Sophie who have breathed new life into a farmhouse. George's desire to live self-sufficiently lead to a lifelong project.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Panama - In Panama, Robson fishes for yellowfin, oysters, dorado and peacock bass.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Weird, Wild & Wonderful - Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep5
programme.desc: September-October - a Time of Activation - Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Thailand: Coming of Age - The Mekong continues its journey south marking the Eastern border of heart of South East Asia, Thailand. It is the juncture of many major regions, where temperate north meets tropical South, making it one of the most biodiverse countries in the world.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Trials of Olimba - Enter the heart of Zambias Luangwa Valley, where shady woodlands and antelope-packed plains offer the perfect hunting grounds for an audacious female leopard named Olimba and the pack she must struggle to control.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Brothers in Arms - The Nsefu lion pride welcomes seven new cubs during the wet season, when antelope and buffalo are spread far from the river, making them harder to hunt. Learn how the mother lionesses work to keep the boisterous cubs alive.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Masters of Defence - Staying alive is job one for these masters of defence. With clever adaptations like mimicry and poison on their side, they continue to outwit predators.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Ghosts of Cederberg - A rocky landscape, carved over eons by wind, water and fire, these are the Cederberg Mountains of South Africa. These imposing peaks are home to an incredible diversity of plants and animals. But there are some here that remain unseen, lurking in the shadows and ready to strike at any time...

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Big Bend - The Big Bend is over two miles long one of the biggest meanders along the Luangwa River in Zambia. Its a busy spot - home to a pod of hippos who luxuriate in its deep pools, an important crossing point for elephants and place to drink for huge herds of buffalo.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades - Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europes birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Weird, Wild & Wonderful - Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.desc: September-October - a Time of Activation - Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Thailand: Coming of Age - The Mekong continues its journey south marking the Eastern border of heart of South East Asia, Thailand. It is the juncture of many major regions, where temperate north meets tropical South, making it one of the most biodiverse countries in the world.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Trials of Olimba - Enter the heart of Zambias Luangwa Valley, where shady woodlands and antelope-packed plains offer the perfect hunting grounds for an audacious female leopard named Olimba and the pack she must struggle to control.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Brothers in Arms - The Nsefu lion pride welcomes seven new cubs during the wet season, when antelope and buffalo are spread far from the river, making them harder to hunt. Learn how the mother lionesses work to keep the boisterous cubs alive.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Ghosts of Cederberg - A rocky landscape, carved over eons by wind, water and fire, these are the Cederberg Mountains of South Africa. These imposing peaks are home to an incredible diversity of plants and animals. But there are some here that remain unseen, lurking in the shadows and ready to strike at any time...

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Water Warriors - From powerful sharks to mysterious and beautiful fish shoals, the underwater dynamic between predator and prey continues. Evolution is on display in these clever creatures as they use all their skills to survive.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades - Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europes birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Weird, Wild & Wonderful - Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep5
programme.desc: September-October - a Time of Activation - Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Thailand: Coming of Age - The Mekong continues its journey south marking the Eastern border of heart of South East Asia, Thailand. It is the juncture of many major regions, where temperate north meets tropical South, making it one of the most biodiverse countries in the world.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep1

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Brothers in Arms - The Nsefu lion pride welcomes seven new cubs during the wet season, when antelope and buffalo are spread far from the river, making them harder to hunt. Learn how the mother lionesses work to keep the boisterous cubs alive.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Enjoy the spring baby boom at the center as the staff go gaga over an adorable bundle of baby possums. Then see the rescue team hit a rooftop patio for a little R and R: retrieving and rescuing a mama and her ducklings perched high above the city.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the centers release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things dont go exactly as planned.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Namib: Land Of Extremes - The Namib Desert is a land of extremes, from icy ocean to baking sand. It takes toughness and adaptation to live in this desert, and only a special few can. From the sidewinding adder to the fog-collecting beetle, each animal has their tricks for survival in the Namib.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ebony Plain - Bustling with wildlife, a grassland lies at the heart of Zambias Luangwa Valley known to locals as "The Ebony Plain". Its a busy little neighborhood - home to a family of warthogs, a troop of baboons and a solitary female leopard named Olimba. Watch as life and death unfold on a daily basis in this corner of the Zambian wilds.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep6
programme.desc: November-December - Full Circle - Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexicos forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Karst Caves - Squeezed between South East Asias two most formidable geographical barriers - the Annamite mountains and the Mekong river, lies Khammouane a rugged karst landscape, honeycombed with countless caves. These caves were formed by water flowing down towards the Mekong.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Trials of Olimba - Enter the heart of Zambias Luangwa Valley, where shady woodlands and antelope-packed plains offer the perfect hunting grounds for an audacious female leopard named Olimba and the pack she must struggle to control.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Dingo - This wild dog has been on Australias shores for at least three-and-a-half-thousand years and is believed to be descended from the Asian wolf; but canis lupus dingo is a distinct species, different from both the wolf and the domestic dog.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Crocodiles - Lurking in the waterways of Queensland and the Northern Territory live the largest living reptiles on Earth; theyre among the most dangerous animals in Australia. Crocodiles are formidable predators, superbly adapted to aquatic life, with skull crushing jaws and lightning speed. They were on earth long before the dinosaurs, and have outlived them by millions of years. Now theyre protected in Australia and their numbers have surged in recent years.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Join the search for a Coopers hawk whos taken a dangerous dip in a backyard pool. Catch the hijinks of the centres skunks as they try to avoid getting their shots, giving the team a closeup experience with the animals stinky natural defences.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: When a baby mink is abandoned in a store, the team gets to work on some behavioural training. But will this sweet little one be tough enough for the wild when theyre done? Visit with a mange-afflicted coyote whos enjoying some alone time to heal.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Last Desert Giants - The Namib is the oldest desert in the world, hugging Africas shoreline for over 400 kilometers. It is one of the most inhospitable habitats on earth. Yet the worlds largest land mammal has made a home here, adapted through behavior and designed to life in the extreme.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tidal Forest of Africa - We follow the South African mangrove forest and its residents through the change from high tide to low and back to high, meeting the red-claw mangrove crabs that keep the forest clean, helping it provide food and shelter for a variety of species.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Fickle River - Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Nature's Crossroads - Thailand is a place of a thousand landscapes, dominated by lush forests, rolling hills and extensive rivers systems that feed into the mighty Mekong. Here the Mekong river continues its journey down the Eastern border, winding its way through biological and geological crossroads, sculpting the landscape and the lives of the creatures that live there.

programme.title: Donal's Family Food in Minutes S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Donal shares recipes that would be perfect for a dinner for two, including a cod and tomato bake and butterscotch puddings.

programme.title: Eat Well For Less S7 Ep5
programme.desc: In Cardiff, 7-year-old William's food allergies mean the Hulme family are restricted to the products they buy and meals they cook. Gregg and Chris give them new ingredients and veggie packed dishes they can all safely enjoy.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Kerie's Hut and Pigsties - Simon and the gang travel to Hampshire to join Kerie and Dave on their land on the border of the South Downs National Park. Nestled in this beautiful woodland lies an old shepherds hut and pigsty which Kerie and Dave dream of renovating in to a B&B business.

programme.title: Grand Designs S18 Ep1
programme.desc: South West London - In South West London Justin plans to restore a neo-Gothic cemetery keeper's lodge and convert its toilet block into a luxury extension complete with a moat and swimming pool. But can he keep his budget under control?

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Rick Stein reaches the mid-point of his meander through France as he continues exploring Burgundy and practises a little entente cordiale with a chateau owner.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals S14 Ep11
programme.desc: In heat six, the four contenders prepare sea bream with couscous and crepes with chocolate hazelnut spread. Then they must impress the judges with their Signature Dishes.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Asiyla's Boat - In rural Oxfordshire, Simon Parfett and his team meet Asiyla and her family. It's a beautiful spot where the three generations of her family live and farm together. Among the free-roaming geese sits an old sailing boat which Asiyla thinks could make unique glamping accommodation.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Like Mamma Used To Make S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Tuscany - There's more to Tuscany than Chianti as Gino reveals a very different side of this much visited region, one that is steeped in medieval heritage and culinary customs.

programme.desc: Edinburgh - Tom Kerridge is taking Fred to Edinburgh, a city that's home to one of the UK's most vibrant food scenes. Tom loves places that offer great ingredients, artful cooking and an unfussy atmosphere.

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders S1 Ep4
programme.desc: In this episode Jamie takes midweek meals up a notch, knocking out a flavour-packed, simple gnocchi supper and giant spicy meatballs full of delicious time-saving cheats, and turns a family favourite on its head with his upside-down fish pie.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep47
programme.desc: Primetime Wendi Powers / A Giant Problem - When Archibald accidentally becomes Wendi Powers camera operator, they team up to crack the story on Crackridges serial prankster. / While Archibald is babysitting, toddler Lola gets her hands on the Sizematron and accidentally bigifies herself to the size of a building!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep22
programme.desc: Baby Face Off / The Pursuit Of Wrinkliness - Thunk babysits Sandy and new baby Cliff to prove his responsible. Cliff is a jerk and keeps getting Sandy in trouble/Gran worries that Thunk isn't tough enough to survive to adulthood because he likes to hang out with old people, so she puts him through a series of toughness tests.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep47
programme.desc: Lucky and the Warm Welcome - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep21
programme.desc: I Wanna Crush Your Hand - When Lotta goes to the Crush 4U concert, she gets a chance to meet the band but makes a bad first impression and goes through great lengths for a second chance. Frufru declares that she doesn't believe in climate change and Dot sets out to change her mind.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep21
programme.desc: Packet Racket / Smack Me Down - When a shady group of bugs moves into the city selling artificial ketchup, Turbo and Shadow go undercover to expose who is behind the operation. // After Turbo is challenged to compete in an underground smack-talk contest, he must get lessons from the best insult snail there is, Burn.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep47
programme.desc: Primetime Wendi Powers / A Giant Problem - When Archibald accidentally becomes Wendi Powers camera operator, they team up to crack the story on Crackridges serial prankster. / While Archibald is babysitting, toddler Lola gets her hands on the Sizematron and accidentally bigifies herself to the size of a building!

programme.desc: Rude-A-Snakening / Afteryard - After being stuck inside a snake, the Mighty Ones escape, but the yard that was their home has changed and is now a much more hostile environment. / The newly renovated yard is inhospitable, but the Mighty Ones find a paradise on the refreshment table at a garden party... until the guests arrive.

programme.desc: Ugly Duckling - As Puss readies a team to defend San Lorenzo, he's shocked to discover his mentor El Guante Blanco has taken on the Ugly Ducking as his newest protg.

programme.desc: Follow The Leader - When Fishlegs discovers a hidden civilization of Albino Night Terrors beneath Dragon's Edge, he must craft an escape plan after they attack the Riders.
